column4: does anyone know why Totem is the default media player in ubuntu? is there any reason for that? why is it the best choice? because I really don't understand it.
no reason it's the "best choice", but it's simply the default... install xine, vlc, mplayer, whatever you want
get rid of the delusion that "default" == "best choice"...
that's just stupid - there are a lot of players to choose from, who would decide what is "best" ?
